data.question: What is the title of the article?
data.answer: Aromatizing Olefin Metathesis by Ligand Isolation inside a Metal–Organic Framework

data.question: Who is the corresponding author of the study?
What method was used to form SALEM-14 from Br-YOMOF?
True or False: The first generation Hoveyda–Grubbs catalyst was effective in converting SALEM-14 into PAH-MOF-1.
What prevents the first generation Grubbs catalyst from converting the divinyldipyridyl pillars in SALEM-14 into PAH pillars in PAH-MOF-1?
data.answer: The mismatch between the size of the catalyst and the dimensions of the pores of an MOF

data.question: What was the main goal of employing SALE and PSM in the synthesis of MOFs?
data.answer: To generate metal/strut combinations in MOFs that are not attainable by any other means

data.question: True or False: SALEM-13 was synthesized directly from the divinylpyridyl linker 3.
What was the yield of the tetravinyldipyridyl strut 6 after the Suzuki coupling reaction?
True or False: The extended structure of the MOF prevents undesired polymerization between tetravinyldipyridyl pillars.
What was the main synthetic challenge overcome by employing SALE and PSM in the study?
data.answer: Achieving the formation of desired frameworks with chemically diverse and useful properties

data.question: True or False: The PXRD pattern of SALEM-13 confirms its non-crystallinity.
What does SALE stand for?
What was the purpose of using the first generation Hoveyda–Grubbs catalyst in the study?
data.answer: To carry out a solid-state reaction in a postsynthetic fashion inside an MOF

data.question: True or False: The synthesis of SALEM-14 was monitored by PXRD spectroscopy.
What was the outcome of the ARCM on SALEM-14?
True or False: The synthesis of Br-YOMOF involved the use of a tetracarboxylic acid ligand.
What was the main advantage of doing chemistry inside a highly organized porous material as mentioned in the study?
data.answer: The unique ability of a rigid, extended framework to site-isolate reactive functional groups

data.question: True or False: The study demonstrated the use of a Ru-based olefin metathesis catalyst inside an MOF for the first time.
What was the main synthetic advantage of employing SALE over de novo synthesis?
data.answer: It provides access to a noninterpenetrated framework without having to resort to de novo synthesis

data.question: True or False: The study established the feasibility of performing intramolecular chemical transformations in MOFs.
